allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Telegram feedback bot with Google Sheets integration

- Bot collects user feedback via Telegram
- Saves data to Google Sheets
- Supports multiple categories
- Secure configuration via environment variables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" auth login --web --git-protocol https)

Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo create telegram-feedback-bot --public --source=. --remote=origin --push --description "Telegram bot for collecting anonymous feedback with Google Sheets integration")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Render.com deployment support

- Support GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS env variable for cloud deployment
- Add render.yaml configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
